name: Militidas Dimitriadis
story: Militidas Dimitriadis was born and raised in Athens, Greece. He joined the Greek army at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional performance and leadership qualities. After several successful missions, he was recruited into the Independent faction, where he serves as a skilled Rifleman and trusted Sergeant. Militidas is a devout Greek Orthodox Christian and is happily married with two children.
